scenario_text.value: Hey, Takuma! Perfect timing.
Oh? Did you need my help with something?

Yeah, you guessed it. Heheh. Actually, I was
hoping I could get your advice.
It’s about Aoi...
Oh? What about her?
I just...I’m not sure how to deal with her.

You know how it always seems like there’s
something she wants to say, only she doesn’t?

Well, that stresses me out. I wish she’d just
come right out and say it.

Sounds like you should come right out and say
that.

I mean, yeah, I know, but...don’t you think
that will make her upset?
Well...probably.

That’s why I wanted to talk to you. What do
you think I should do about this?

(Let me see... What’s the best way I can
answer this question?)

(If Saki really has a problem with Aoi, she
can always just keep her distance.)

(Instead, she’s asking me for advice. What
could that mean?)
How should I respond to Saki?
You want to get along?
You want fight it out?
You’ve fallen for me?

You want to find a way to get along better
with Aoi?
To be honest, I don’t know.

I mean, we may not really see eye-to-eye,
but...it’s not like I hate her.
That’s why I’m asking your advice.

(Hmm, she doesn’t seem too sure about this,
but at least she says she doesn’t hate Aoi.)
I wonder what Aoi thinks of me...

You’re not looking for some way to fight all
this out, are you?
You know, settle things once and for all?

...Takuma, do you seriously think that’s what
I’m planning?
Well, no, not exactly...

Because maybe you need to get your head
examined.

(Well, at least that’s proof she doesn’t have
it out for Aoi that badly.)
Saki...are you in love with me or something?

What? What gave you that idea? Like, why
would you even think to ask that?
Oh, no! I mean, I just thought, uh...

I figured since you wanted to talk to me
about this, maybe you had feelings for me...
Takuma, that is one hell of a leap.
You mean...it’s not like that?!
It’s not like that at all!
*sigh* Anyway...

I wonder if there’s a good way for Aoi and me
to get along.
